content: This app got its rating destroyed by people across the water, therefore, the HSC deserve as many 5 star ratings as possible.
Very good

Useless and a waste of tax payer money. What's the point of this app? It shows text which I can see on any website and get the same service as this "app". And it's only available to NI? What's next, a different app for every other village in NI? What a joke. It's clearly a set-up between developers and HSC to show the public they are doing something, in reality doing nothing.
Good app
Who owns this App is it a private profit making company? If so is this another privatisation by the back door which is all too common with the NHS overall in recent years Own it Don't rent it!
To G Rice - You thick Mick NI is british
No updated figures since April 30
Intresing read about covid 19
Very good feels like I can really see what's going on
Great app for the people in N. Ireland
It works in Spain also!, just type a NI postcode. Funciona en España también, pon un CP Norirlandés. It's just the web in an app.
I'm in England and it works just fine! Great App!!
Does not start for me

The original dashboard contained graphs and charts as well as regional information that enabled people to get a far better idea of the ongoing situation this app gives the minimum information possible. Not pleased with it and uninstalling it now
This ap has not been updated since 19th
Useless
Was good great apps

Great app for people in NI (as stated in title), includes symptoms, contact details and advice for people in Northern Ireland. Our services operate differently than those in the UK so don't be an idiot and download if you're anywhere else in the world, it's not going to work for you.
Great app. Has bad reviews due to people being unable to read, it quite clearly says NI in the apps name.

Brilliant app. Does exactly what is required and is easy to use. Thank you for your hard work. It's a shame a lot of the people reviewing the app do not have the basic level of intelligence to realise it's for people here in northern Ireland so they can track our localised cases. I can only assume these are the same people who don't social distance and burn 5g phone masts. App developers have done a top job.
App works fine. Mostly putting this here for the morons that don't understand it's for NI only, mostly people in England who don't understand how borders work.
This is an NI only app, please stop giving it 1 stars because you're not in NI it's making it harder for the people who should be seeing this in their suggested feed to get it.
I'm in the south so can't use app but 5 stars for the salty response you've provoked from across the water, very enjoyable reading.

This app has been released by the HSC in Northern Ireland to help track symptoms in Northern Ireland. Of course it isn't available in England, Scotland and Wales which are DIFFERENT COUNTRIES. Like it or not, Northern Ireland isn't Britain, it's in Ireland. Lobby your local MP if your local NHS has not made an app instead of being salty that the HSC in NI did make one. Edit: the influx of negative reviews proving once again that the British can't even read.
Good
Just hope everybody stays well and good
bad
Great App for people of Northern Ireland !
It dose not work in England.
Sorry 2 stars only. App not for England or Wales. Advertised on the news as available all over UK and this is not so. So I've uninstalled it.

I was looking for statistics on the spread in NI as we are lumped in with the UK in official statistics, this app doesn't seem to have that. Useful advice but nothing I haven't heard 1000 times already - those who aren't listening won't be downloading the app anyway.
Simple interface, easy to find information on Northern Ireland; appreciated.
Why is this only available in NI and not available anywhere else I think its deplorable as we are all dealing with this and not just NI
N/A
This is rubbish how are people supposed to check if the have it cause this is only for Ireland

I know people are like don't be mean bcz its for the NI only but they're wrong.The country is small and there should be an app for everyone.U wouldn't do an app only for Edinburgh you would do it for everyone
Helps a bit but I still rang 111 help line
No good
Nothing new or useful here.
Bad i need it to work in the uk dundee

Great app by the Health and Social Care Northern Ireland, designed to help those in Northern Ireland. So many idiots outside of Northern Ireland can't seem to read the app name or details. Lobby your local healthcare provider's for a similar type app in your region. Don't leave a 1 star review just because you can't bloody read that it's an HSC app called Covid-19 NI.

Random NI postcode: BT1 1AA. Don't restrict to NI you imbecile... Just limit functionalities / reporting for outsiders if any... Those are vital informations and there is absolutely no technical reason for doing so. I think NI's people proudly supporting the restriction don't get the point of internet and should instead go back to stoneage where many selfish of them belong as their smartphone is not made in NI nor is 90 percent of anything they use - including medications
Very helpful

After reading an article in the paper of an app, I thought I would search for it and this was the only one to appear. The app did not allow me to proceed because I wasn't from NI. So instead of helping anyone and everyone in the world, the app would let me go no further. This is hopefully an oversight and something you could fix to still assist others . If not, then the developers are disgusting and need to remember, we are all in this together. I may change my review, if this is fixed.
Northern Ireland is part of the UK if your part of the UK doesnt have an app maybe ask about them making one? stop harassing the people who made this for northern Ireland it's a great app
After questions are finished, back button goes back through the questions again. No question on losing sense of smell or taste. No button to go back to the start again
Only available in Ireland!
Excellent well put together app. Excellent information and resources. Well done.

This application is not that reliable for residents outside of Northern Ireland. Due to this, I would not consider downloading it if you live in England Scotland and Wales. However, I personally and earnestly believe that this app should be available not just in the UK but the whole world . This app will also require you to enter your full postcode and agree to the terms and conditions which is a risk. Generally, I would not consider this app. NOTE: If you was wondering I am a 9 years old👿.
Very good
Great app, though the virtual assistant could use some more specific information / ai training. Thanks for making this.
When is the uk getting added or even USA???
Great app northern Ireland only folks..
Handy advice in scarey times
Terrifying but informative. Horrendous when I read about bodies in body bags and sprayed with distinfectant, brought tears to my eyes.
Great App good to see something positive been available.
Does the job for Northern Ireland! There is an app for the rest of UK - how about you read the description before downloading and giving a negative score.

Developers are selfish enough to region lock the app? Yeah I get it; the title says it's for northern Ireland but it would cost nothing for the Devs to release the region lock. People's lives are quite literally at stake here and you're selfish enough to only open this app to residents of s very small region
App works 100% - as per description it is a NI only app put out by Belfast HSC, works exactly as described
Doesn't work in the UK
Informative app
A must if you live in NI!
no good if you don't live in northern island

Easy to use.
Accurate info for northern Ireland residents
Live reports Deaths and affacted
Timely app, delivered in record time. Provides advice for all in NI, and more for those experiencing symptoms. Clearly states only intended for the 1.9 million residents of Northern Ireland.

FOR NORTHERN IRELAND RESIDENTS ONLY. Read before downloading and stop leaving 1star ratings because u can't read. A quick search and u'll find NHS England and NHS Scotland have their own information. Great app. Having all information in one place is great and very useful. And nice to see HSC NI for once are in front of the other NHS regions.

This app crashes immediately after starting it, each time, even after restarting the phone. And yes, I am living here in NI, but I do not even get to the question of the post code. Please make a less device-specific app. Good wishes to all readers in these uncertain times!

Great app, works really well. Northern Ireland is in the UK but like the other 3 parts of the UK we have our own NHS called HSC. What did you all think the NI stood for in the apps name? Not Included?
Easy to use and clear advice. If you want to use the symptom checker. Put in 'BT1 5GS' the postcode for Belfast City Hall otherwise contact your own local healthcare provider for advice.

Easy to use, trustworthy, simple app, however do be aware it's a helpful guide, not a hard medical diagnosis. Note is Northern Ireland specific, pity it can't include mainland UK as it's the NHS both sides of the Irish sea.

Great service for Northern Ireland. Apparently people across the water are either ignorant of what NI stands for or cannot read but it's an app made by the Northern Irish Health board for the people of the province.

Useless the chatbot never understand anything and all the other stuff is already all over the internet,stop wasting peoples time with this failure of a app. FOR THOSE NOT IN N.IRELAND It does not work because the clue is in the name its for northern ireland and is only a gimmic to make them look as if they are doing something.
Great app. Works perfectly in NI, which it's designed to work for. Never hear this much complaining when something "for the UK" doesn't work in NI, I wonder why?
Does not work for UK personal
cant use it in the uk, its only for Northern Ireland - so what is the point in anybody downloading it?

I have seen lots of criticism about this app. Yes it is only for NI as the title indicates!!! Good to have one for NI as we are always left out eg uk mainland only. I'm sure there is other apps for England etc. I think is a great idea going forward and may prove valuable in the weeks ahead. Well done HSC.
Good for checking symptoms. It says NI on the app! Common sense isn't all that common
Finally something for the people in northern Ireland. 1☆rating are inaccurate as the download an app that states in its title that it is Northern Ireland based that's what the NI stands for.

Please stop giving inappropriate 1 star reviews just because this app is only produced by Northern Ireland Health Care. It states NI in the title. Please support ALL health workers at this time. Great app that perhaps others should follow. #staysafe

Idiots in the review section giving this one star. It has been developed by the HSC (i.e. the NHS in the north of Ireland). Of course it will only work with an NI postcode, lobby your own NHS to develop an app.
Really, why only Northern Ireland
TO ALL THOSE SAYING IT DOESN'T WORK IN THE UK... It isn't meant to. You're an idiot. It literally says it's for Northern Ireland in the title.

Not bad. To all the people saying its useless as it only works in Northern Ireland, just what exactly do you think the NI in the bloody name stood for? If you're that stupid maybe you shouldn't be allowed a smartphone - Jeez! 🙄

Brilliant app for quick and reassuring diagnosis. Quite obvious it's from and for the Northern Ireland NHS trusts as stated in the description and opening of the app. Don't see why it's getting bashed so much. Keep up the good work devs.
Works brilliant

It's nice for something to exclude the rest of the UK for a change! The app works perfectly and would recommend for all of those people who can read that it says NI in the title and have a NI postcode :)
Unable to get past postcode question as do not live in Northern Ireland. Sort it out!
Useless in the UK
Can't move past the postcode request as I do not live in N.Ireland. Definite glitch, hope it gets resolved as this is actually a very good idea to track the virus or at least its presenting symptoms.
Says I have to be n Ireland to use only
Very useful even if you don't have think you have it!

Fantastic app for the province of Northern Ireland. It says "NI" in the title, and as such I don't want to hear English people complaining about the app. Don't download an app not made for you. We can't order things that claim to be for the UK and yous complain about an app made for NI?
Great app for northern Ireland - don't download it if you're not from here. I mean the name should give it away that it's not for England to use
YES it's only for Northern Ireland. Health services are devolved. Tell Boris to get his finger out and do one for England. A good team of developers can do it in 2 weeks.

Nice app for local health service, good layout, unsure why people can't read the NI part, but good on the HSC to take the initiative for the local response especially incase it starts to differ from rest of UK, e.g all island response.

Great and informative app. All the 1 star reviews are from people who don't understand that this app is ONLY FOR NORTHERN IRELAND. Even though it mentions this in the title, description and first page of the app.
Great app for NI. Wish people would stop leaving 1 star reviews it says NORTHERN IRELAND ONLY. Finally something that doesn't say excludes NI 🤣🤣
Great app. Pity the morons that give it 1star can't read. NORTHERN IRELAND ONLY. You have your own app!!!!

Not much good. Full of info that just about everyone already knows - tells me I should get food delivered as I'm at risk, but not a word about how this is possible, with all delivery slots booked solid. And the AI on the 'ask a question' function is rubbish, answering questions that I didn't ask, no matter how often and how basically I rephrase the question. Basically a waste of space on my phone. And yes, I Am in NI.

It's a good app, unsure why the comments are being so annoyed about it not working outside of northern ireland whenever the app is called covid 19 ni... Anyhow if any of the people actually wanted to use the app outside the UK all they would need to do is look on Google for a post code from northern Ireland which is easy to find and since we're all on lock down then you all have plenty of time to Google it.
Very good app
ÑHS rocks
Great app. Exactly what is needed. Packed with useful websites and information.
Very easy to use and understand - perhaps an eg for postcode format would help. Well done!

To those giving 1star maybe read about the app first clearly states NI HSC. Also Google a NI postcode to use as it is a symptom checker if worried. There is also a dashboard which seem to give info on who to contact in all of the UK.
Great app for folks in NI. Well done, HSC!
Only works in Northern Ireland for some reason...
Brilliant app 👏👏👏
Useful and similar to 111.nhs.uk website

Great app. Unfortunately quite a few folks don't understand what the HSC NI only support NI. The clue is in the title. Please stop scoring the app down because it only supports the area the HSC NI operate in.

To all the people who aren't residents of Northern Ireland complaining about why this isn't for the entire UK etc.: you need to understand that HSC NI is a separate entity to the English NHS and the Scottish NHS and the provision of the services (including the facts/figures/advice available for dissemination) is fully applicable only to NI. If you want a similar app with advice directly relevant to you, then you need to speak with the NHS relevant to you. This is a great app... For NI residents.
Excellent app easy to use and very informative. Well done
Why only Northern Ireland? It's a bit scummy to deny an important symptom checker just because of where you live. It's basically a test/quiz, tests aren't location dependant.
Only Northern Ireland
Brilliant app. Very easy to use. AS THE NAME SAYS CORVID 19.......NI = NORTHERN IRELAND... Great to have information about our local region.... well done

Do people not realise this is for Northern Ireland? Stop leaving 1 star reviews, it's inappropriate. Each nation in the UK has its own "NHS" In Northern Ireland the National Health Service (NHS) is referred to as HSC or Health and Social Care. Just like the NHS is it free at the point of delivery but in Northern Ireland it also provides social care services like home care services, family and children's services, day care services and social work services. BTW the app is good and informative

Good informative app. Please stop giving the HSC a hard time for being proactive and developing a Northern Ireland specific app! It contains stats, medical contact information and the current situation for NI specifically, so you wouldn't find it beneficial if you live outside the country anyway. The symptom checker is the same as on the UK government website. I'm sure other countries are developing similar apps, or forward this to them and request it.

Very good app, nice to have something that's actually available in NI, at least the rest of GB will get a taste of how we feel when we try to get anything online delivered here 😂 and if you're desperate to use it just Google a Northern Irish post code and use that.

Great app. For all of you complaining, the app is literally for Northern Ireland. NI. Clue is in the name. There's a different covid 19 one for the rest of the UK. Its not hard to find if you type in Covid-19. Seriously, leaving a one star review because you can't read. Not really the developers fault is it? 🙄
Great to have an app providing a hub for local information!

Good app filled with information. If you're not in NI please don't download then complain, it does say in the name NI. Our health department made this app, and you can find all the information online too.
23 MB for what? Pure shite.
Keeps saying only available in ireland. No good in uk
Very informative from an official source and easy to use.
Superb app. To the 1 star reviews... The clue is in the title!!! NI🤔

Good app and easy to use. Gives local advice to people in Northern Ireland. Ignore 1 star ratings by people who don't live in NI. What sort of people down vote a Covid 19 app because its not their region!
Good app simple user interface and gives good advice about the corona virus would be good to have something like this for other places apart from Northern Ireland
Excellent official local information for Northern Ireland
Intuitive and informative app that has been produced in a sensationally efficient time frame when time is of the essence.

It is stupid to have the app just for northern Ireland, should make it available everywhere. The virus us world wide. I don't care how much attention Irish crave, it's selfish needs to be for everyone
Super Design. Very easy to use. Love the chatbot advice search!

The app is for Northern Ireland - don't download if you don't love here (or else put in an NI postcode when asked). If you live here it's very good. Nice simple symptom checker, and advice. And no rubbish! Apparently there's a chatbot in there somewhere too
Great wee app. NOTE: For Northern Ireland only! Stop downloading if you aren't in Northern Ireland, ignore the 1 star ratings, it's people who didn't realise the NI is Northern Ireland.
Helped assured some very important people in my life, thanks! Edit: Anyone marking it down is too stupid to read that it is an app for the NORTHERN IRELAND health and social care 🙄

Brilliant app
Excellent app, very informative

An excellent application
